text: Cereus mirabella is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitat is dry savanna. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==Sources== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Cereus mirabella. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. title: Cereus mirabella
